Text: Rated PG-13 for mature thematic elements including disturbing disaster and accident images, and for brief strong language.

Pretty decent CAM and a fast download...
A/7
V/7
Fairly decent picture, there's still some flickering and focus issues and the audio is a bit tinny with slight echo, but after saying that it's still a watchable copy.   If your not wanting to wait for the DVDRip then this copy might see you through...
Many Thanx to raymondhome and IMAGiNE for the decent cam rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a quick download...:)
